titleStmt.title: The case of Sir Edward Hales, Baronet being an exact account of the tryal upon an action of 500 pound brought against him, with his plea thereto, upon the King's dispensing with the Stat. 25. Car. II and the opinion of the judges thereupon.
titleStmt.author: Hales, Edward, Sir, d. 1695, defendant.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
